summary.span: 提供用來繪製通用 Windows 控制項和其元件的方法。

span.span: Provides methods used to paint common Windows controls and their elements.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 內含的方法類別可讓您繪製自己的控制項的項目。The methods contained in the class enable you to draw your own controls or elements of controls. 您可以控制您自己的控制項繪製是否位元設為`true`控制項。You can control the drawing of your own controls if the bit is set to `true` for the control. 您可以取得或設定樣式位元，藉由呼叫或方法。You can get or set the style bits by calling the or methods. 您可以設定任何控制項的多個樣式位元。You can set multiple style bits for any control. 列舉型別成員可以結合的位元運算。The enumeration members can be combined with bitwise operations. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用其中一個建構函式來繪製一般控制項。The following code example uses one of the constructors to draw a flat control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 選取框架是在設計階段選取的元件周圍繪製的畫面格。A selection frame is a frame that is drawn around a selected component at design time. `backColor`參數用來計算框架填滿色彩，使其一律與背景顯示。The `backColor` parameter is used to calculate the fill color of the frame so that it is always visible against the background. 如果`active`參數設為`true`，選取框架繪製成一組串聯標記，指出元件已經啟動; 否則選取框架使用虛線圖樣或繪製做任何事，視實作而定.If the `active` parameter is set to `true`, the selection frame is drawn as a set of hatch marks indicating that the component has been activated; otherwise, the selection frame is drawn with a dotted pattern or nothing, depending on the implementation.

summary.span: 在螢幕上繪製填滿、可反轉的矩形。

span.span: Draws a filled, reversible rectangle on the screen.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `backColor`參數用來計算矩形的填滿色彩，使它一律會顯示與背景。The `backColor` parameter is used to calculate the fill color of the rectangle so that it is always visible against the background. 這個方法的結果可以反轉藉由重新繪製該相同的矩形。The results of this method can be reversed by drawing the same rectangle again. 繪製矩形，使用此方法很類似反轉的螢幕區域，不同之處在於它提供更佳的效能更廣泛的色彩。Drawing a rectangle using this method is similar to inverting a region of the screen, except that it provides better performance for a wider variety of colors. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法。The following code example demonstrates using the method. 若要執行此範例，請將下列的程式碼貼在表單中。To run the example, paste the following code in a form. 新增名為按鈕`Button2`至表單，並確保所有的事件都已連接至其事件處理常式。Add a button named `Button2` to the form and ensure all events are connected to their event handlers.
